mainEntity.name: What home builders are in Skye Canyon Las Vegas?

acceptedAnswer.text: Century Communities is the primary new construction builder in Skye Canyon, offering three distinct communities: Eaglepointe and Marvella starting in the high $500s, and Skyecrest starting in the low $700s.

mainEntity.name: What is the price range for new homes in Skye Canyon?

acceptedAnswer.text: New construction homes in Skye Canyon by Century Communities range from the high $500s to the low $700s and up, with flexible floor plans and luxury customization options available.

mainEntity.name: How many bedrooms do Century Communities homes have?

acceptedAnswer.text: Century Communities homes in Skye Canyon offer up to six bedrooms with flexible floor plans that allow customization with additional lofts, bedrooms, dens, and luxurious primary suites.

mainEntity.name: Do Skye Canyon new homes have garages?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Century Communities homes in Skye Canyon feature both 2-bay and 3-bay garages, providing ample storage and parking for residents and their recreational equipment.

mainEntity.name: Are quick move-in homes available in Skye Canyon?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Century Communities offers quick move-in homes in Skye Canyon for buyers who need faster occupancy. Contact Dr. Jan Duffy at (702) 500-1902 for current inventory and availability.

mainEntity.name: What makes Century Communities homes special?

acceptedAnswer.text: Century Communities homes feature flexible floor plans for every life stage, generous outdoor spaces to enjoy the desert climate, and extensive customization options with premium finishes.

provider.name: Dr. Jan Duffy
provider.specialization: New Construction and Century Communities Expert
